document.docAuthor: Li, Wenliang, Chen, Xulong & Yang, Ding
document.docTitle: Noeetomima liui Li & Chen & Yang 2020, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Five new species of the genus Noeetomima Enderlein (Diptera: Lauxaniidae) from China, with a key to world species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Five new species of the genus Noeetomima Enderlein (Diptera: Lauxaniidae) from China, with a key to world species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: College of Forestry, Henan University of Science and Technology, Luoyang 471023, China. & laughonce @ 126. com, wenliangli @ haust. edu. cn, https: // orcid. org / 0000 - 0001 - 9019 - 1223

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. Palpus brown with black setulae. Mesoscutum: presutural dorsocentral seta before horizontal level of presutural acrostichal setulae. Scutellum shiny blackish brown, with grayish white pruinosity on basal 1/3. Fore femur with 5 strong posterior ventral setae and hind femur with 2 strong anterior ventral setae. Wing with 7 long white radiating stripes along margin between tips of R 2+3 and CuA 1, short irregular white lines in brown central area. Surstylus consisting of 1 anterior process and 1 posteroapical process in lateral view; anterior process long with setae, apex acute, posterior process short, widening apically and truncated.
Description. MALE. Body length 2.2 mm , wing length 2.7 mm . FEMALE. Unknown

Thorax ( Fig. 24 ) brown, with grayish yellow pruinosity. Mesoscutum with pair of narrow brown median stripes extending from anterior margin to presutural acrostichal setulae, posterior margin of postpronotum surrounded by brown line, 3–4 brown spots scattered between dorsocentral and supraalar setal rows, pair of black triangular posterior marginal spots(the bottom of spots fused) extending to scutellum; 1+3 dorsocentral setae, anteriormost post-sutural dorsocentral seta near transverse scutal suture, presutural dorsocentral seta before horizontal level of presutural acrostichal setulae, 1+2 acrostichal setulae (not including prescutellar seta) and in 2 rows, 1st post-sutural acrostichal setulae on transverse scutal suture; dorsocentral seta, acrostichal setulae and prescutellar seta each with 1 brown basal spots. Anepisternum and katepisternum brown with grayish pruinosity; anepisternum with 2 median brown spots and 1 brown spot on lower margin, 2 anepisternal setae and 3–4 short setulae; 2 katepisternal setae. Scutellum shiny blackish brown, with grayish white pruinosity on basal 1/3. Legs yellow except apical tarsomeres brown; femur pale brown to brown except yellow at tip, tibia with 1 subbasal ring. Fore femur with 5 strong posterior ventral setae and 4 posterior dorsal setae; fore tibia with 1 long dorsal preapical seta and 2 short apical ventral setae. Mid femur with 4 anterior setae and 1 apical posterior seta; mid tibia with 1 strong dorsal preapical seta and 1 strong apical ventral seta. Hind femur with 2 strong anterior ventral setae and 1 preapical anterior dorsal seta; hind tibia with 1 dorsal preapical seta and 1 short apical ventral seta. Wing ( Fig. 22 ) almost brown, with 7 long white radiating stripes along margin between tips of R 2+3 and CuA 1 ; short irregular white lines in brown central area; posterior margin undulating; costa with 2nd (between R 1 and R 2+3 ), 3rd (between R 2+3 and R 4+5 ) and 4th (between R 4+5 and M 1 ) sections in proportion of 4.6: 1.8: 1; r-m beyond middle of discal cell; ultimate and penultimate sections of M
1 in
proportion of 2.5: 1; ultimate section of CuA 1 about 1/11 of penultimate. Halter brown, stem yellow.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype ( CAUC ): 1 ♂ , CHINA ,
Yunnan Province
: Tengchong Shabacun ,
2006. V. 18
, Xingyue Liu.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks. The new species is very similar to
Noeetomima radiata Enderlein
from Harbin, but
N. liui
can be separated from the latter by the hind femur having 2 anterior ventral setae; face having brown groove near ventral margin.
Etymology. Liui , Latin, named after Xingyue Liu, the collector of the holotype .
